body:
Preamble: An Act to provide for the recognition and protection of native title and for its co-existence with the national land management system, and for related purposes.
Section 3: The objects of this Act are: (a) to provide for the recognition and protection of native title; (b) to establish ways in which future dealings affecting native title may proceed and to set standards for those dealings; and (c) to establish a mechanism for determining claims to native title.
